bibl.title: Christianity and Monasticism in Aswan and Nubia.

bibl.seg: Jitse H.F. Dijkstra & Gertrud J.M. van Loon, The Christian Wall Paintings from the Temple of Isis at Aswan Revisited.
Gawdat Gabra & Hany N. Takla (edd.), Christianity and Monasticism in Aswan and Nubia (Cairo - New York, 2013) pp. 137-156, 9 figg.
